text: Anyang railway station () is a station on Beijing–Guangzhou railway in Anyang, Henan. The station is the northernmost station operated by CR Zhengzhou on Beijing–Guangzhou railway. ==History== The station was opened in 1904. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Stations on the Beijing–Guangzhou Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1904
title: Anyang railway station
